installer.title: Floorp 安装程序
installer.description: 安装 Floorp 浏览器，开启注重隐私、快速且可定制化的浏览体验。
installer.adminRightsEnabled: 以管理员权限为所有用户安装。
installer.customPathRequired: 自定义安装路径需要管理员权限。

exitConfirmation.title: 取消安装？
exitConfirmation.message: Canceling the installation process will prevent Floorp from being installed.

complete.launchCheckbox: 安装后启动 Floorp 浏览器

slide1.title: 欢迎使用 Floorp
slide1.description: Welcome to the latest version of Floorp, a web browser developed with a focus on development and research in Japan. The content introduced next is only a part of the project.

slide2.title: Regular Updates
slide2.description: Floorp is maintained and updated continuously, even as a community-based project. We deliver safe browsing aligned with the principle that the web should be accessible freely to everyone.

slide3.title: 最新功能
slide3.description: The latest version of Floorp leverages cutting-edge web features developed by Mozilla's Firefox. It has also been redesigned to make tools everyone desires easily accessible.

slide4.title: Advanced Customization
slide4.description: Equipped with numerous customization options to maintain privacy better than your default browser. Floorp allows you to realize your preferred configuration.

slide5.title: Fighting for You
slide5.description: Floorp blocks harmful tracking. We balance website operation and user rights, working to improve the web both in functionality and privacy.

success.downloaded_dev_mode: Floorp installer has been downloaded (development mode)

errors.installer_not_found: 无法获取 Floorp 安装包。
errors.signature_verification_failed: 安装程序签名验证失败。由于安全原因中止执行。
errors.signature_verification_error: An error occurred during signature verification: {{0}}
errors.installer_execution: An error occurred while running the installer: {{0}}
errors.browser_not_found: 未找到 Floorp 浏览器。安装成功，但找不到浏览器可执行文件。
errors.admin_rights_denied: Administrator rights were denied. You selected the administrator rights mode, but permission was denied.
errors.exit_code_not_found: Could not get the installer's exit code. Administrator rights may have been denied.
errors.powershell_script_creation: 创建 PowerShell 脚本失败： {{0}}
errors.powershell_process: 启动 PowerShell 进程失败： {{0}}
errors.admin_install_failed: Installation with administrator rights failed. Exit code: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_launch: Failed to launch installer process with user rights: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_execution: An issue occurred while running the installer with user rights: {{0}}
